sentences.en: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.cn: 耶稣仍不回答、连一句话也不说、以致巡抚甚觉希奇.

sentences.en: And they were all amazed, insomuch that they questioned among themselves, saying , What thing is this?
sentences.cn: 众人都惊讶, 以致彼此对问说: [是甚麽事?

sentences.en: He worked very fast, insomuch that he was through in an hour.
sentences.cn: 他工作得很快, 一小时内便做完了.

sentences.en: I worked very fast, insomuch that I was through in half an hour.
sentences.cn: 我干得很快, 半小时内就把活儿做完了.

sentences.en: Insomuch as the accused had confessed, the judge would not punish him severely.
sentences.cn: 由于被告已经坦白了, 法官就不会严厉惩罚他.

sentences.en: Insomuch that his heart had just now swelled , and the tears had come into his eyes.
sentences.cn: 这时候,他非常激动, 而且立刻热泪盈眶了.

sentences.en: It was raining heavily insomuch that they were soon drenched.
sentences.cn: 雨下得那麽大,以致于他们不久之后就湿透了.

sentences.en: The rain fell in torrents , insomuch that we were wet through.
sentences.cn: 大雨滂沱, 我们全身都湿透了.

sentences.en: The rain fell in torrents insomuch that we were drenched.
sentences.cn: 倾盆大雨使我们变成落汤鸡.

sentences.en: The rain fell in torrents, insomuch that the soldiers were often ankle - deep in water.
sentences.cn: 大雨倾盆, 因而士兵们时时需涉水而行.

sentences.en: The rain fell in torrents, insomuch that they were ankle - deep in water.
sentences.cn: 大雨滂沱, 以致他们处在没踝深的积水中.

sentences.en: This statement was important insomuch as it revealed the extent of their knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这一陈述显示了他们了解的情况之多,因而十分重要.

trans.tran_en: to such an extent or degree
